items.name: Kalandra's Touch
flavourText: On one hand, you have a choice.
On the other, you have its twin.

items.typeLine: Specialist's Diamond Flask of the Ibex
explicitMods: 26% chance to gain a Flask Charge when you deal a Critical Strike
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.name: Headhunter
explicitMods: 24% increased Damage with Hits against Rare monsters
When you Kill a Rare monster, you gain its Modifiers for 60 seconds
flavourText: "A man's soul rules from a cavern of bone, learns and
judges through flesh-born windows. The heart is meat.
The head is where the Man is."
- Lavianga, Advisor to Kaom

items.name: Eyes of the Greatwolf
flavourText: I am but a vessel for a greater force.
It acts through me. Speaks through me.
Decides what lives and dies through me.
And will change the world through me.

items.name: Greed's Embrace
implicitMods: +2 to Level of Socketed Projectile Gems
flavourText: Some would question if the risk was worth it.
The rest were already dead.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports skills that hit enemies, causing them to gain bonuses while you have resonance of all three elements, and to grant resonance of elements other than the highest one in a hit. There is a maximum of 50 Resonance for each Element. Cannot support triggered skills, instant skills, orb skills, brands, skills with a reservation, or skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Cannot modify the skills of minions.
explicitMods:
Hits with Supported Skills for which the highest Damage Type is Elemental cause you to gain 25 Resonance of other Elements per second for 2 seconds
Lose 5 Resonance per second of each Element you are not gaining
Supported Skills deal 3% more Elemental Damage per 5 of lowest Resonance
Supported Skills penetrate 16% Elemental Resistances while each Resonance is at least 25
Supported Skills deal 10% increased Elemental Damage
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Fires a piercing shot that travels until it reaches the targeted location. It will then fire projectiles out in all directions from that point, which will travel for a short time before disappearing.
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports projectile skills, making their projectiles fork into two projectiles the first two times they hit an enemy and don't pierce it.
explicitMods: Projectiles from Supported Skills can Fork an additional Time
Supported Skills deal 15% more Projectile Damage
Supported Skills deal 10% increased Projectile Damage
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports attack skills that can be used with bows. Supported skills can only be used with bows. Cannot support Vaal skills, minion skills, movement skills, or skills used by totems, traps, or mines.
explicitMods: Supported Skills deal 10% increased Attack Damage

When you Hit an Enemy with an Arrow from a Supported Skill, Summon a Mirage Archer which uses that Skill
Mirage Archer can use Triggered Attacks as though they were not Triggered
Mirage Archer uses Supported Skill with 60% less Attack Speed
Mirage Archer deals 31% less Damage with Supported Skills
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill. Minions, Totems, Traps and Mines cannot gain Inspiration Charges.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 39% reduced Mana Cost

Gain an Inspiration Charge when you Spend Mana on Upfront
Costs or Effects of Supported Skills
Lose all Inspiration Charges after Spending a total of 800 Mana on Upfront Costs and Effects of Supported Skills
Supported Skills deal 5% more Elemental Damage per Inspiration Charge
Supported Skills have 8% increased Critical Strike Chance per Inspiration Charge

enchantMods: Quality does not increase Physical Damage
explicitMods: 36% chance to deal Double Damage while Focused

socketedItems.secDescrText: Fires an arrow into the air to land at a targeted location, dealing area damage. The arrow sticks in the ground where it lands, and periodically fires a beam of lightning to another arrow near it, dealing area damage between them.
explicitMods: 50% of Physical Damage Converted to Lightning Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill with an area of effect, regardless of whether that skill deals damage.

items.name: Goldwyrm
flavourText: The wyrm draws warmth from the fires of desire.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Take less Physical and Elemental Damage for a short time. Consumes up to 5 Endurance Charges to lengthen the buff and further lessen Physical Damage taken. Shares a cooldown with other Guard skills.
explicitMods: 20% increased Buff Duration per Endurance Charge removed
This Skill's Cooldown does not recover during its effect
15.0% less Physical Damage taken per Endurance Charge removed

explicitMods: When Hit during effect, 25% of Life loss from Damage taken occurs over 4 seconds instead
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: They were bred in a cosmic ocean of raw creation.
Feasting and drinking of the milk of the mother,
they fought to the death for every last drop.

items.name: Ventor's Gamble
flavourText: In a blaze of glory,
An anomaly defying all odds
The "unkillable" beast met the divine
And Ventor met his latest trophy.
